manifest.title: Translate
manifest.author: Translate Developers
manifest.description:
### Overview

Free and Open Source Machine Translation API, entirely self-hosted.

The app comes preinstalled with those languages: en,ar,az,ca,zh,cs,da,nl,eo,fi,fr,de,el,he,hi,hu,id,ga,it,ja,ko,fa,pl,pt,ru,sk,es,sv,tr,uk

**The app image is around 16Gb large due to the machine learning models**

This package is proudly built from [LibreTranslate](https://libretranslate.com/)'s [open source software](https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate).

#### No affiliation or endorsement

Please note that Cloudron has no affiliation with LibreTranslate and this package is not endorsed by them.
manifest.changelog:
* Update libretranslate to 1.8.4
* [Full Changelog](https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/releases/tag/v1.8.4)
* Add --translation-cache by [@pierotofy](https://github.com/pierotofy) in [#912](https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/912)
* Update argos-translate, use MINISBD by [@pierotofy](https://github.com/pierotofy) in [#928](https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/928)
manifest.postInstallMessage:
By default, `en` and `de` language packs are pre-installed. To add more languages, see the [documentation](https://docs.cloudron.io/packages/translate/#languages).

By default, the API can be used without a key by anyone. [Generate a key](https://docs.cloudron.io/apps/libretranslate/#api) to lock the app.
